We've got your mood on tap. Only at McSorley's Experience McSorleyâ€™s on A1A, facing the beach â€” a vibrant two-story venue with 40+ TVs, offering live sports daily, including NFL, NCAA, Premier League, UFC, and more. Enjoy live music, karaoke, and DJs each week. Explore our diverse selection of beer, wine, cocktails, frozen drinks, and delicious food. Whether youâ€™re after a pub, sports bar, or rooftop drink in the sun, weâ€™re sure youâ€™ll be back! Valet parking is available at the Sonesta Hotel next door. Join us for a memorable time! Reserve a table See what a few of our customers had to share Rock on McSorleyâ€™s! Epic evening highlighted with breathtaking views, scrumptious bites, refreshing drinks made exceptional by impeccable service! Best corner views, comfort of home in paradise! Irish E Perfectly food at a decent price. Very friendly staff and a good range of beers. I would recommend the karaoke evenings, really good fun Gary M The beers, the food the atmosphere are very nice. At McSorleyâ€™s now you can enjoy their remodeled rooftop and listen to live music. Maria L We came here this past weekend as a bachelorette group and had an amazing time! Our service was perfect. We were a big group which was handled with ease. The rooftop is beautiful and we loved watching the football game there. We had an absolute blast! Maggie S A really great Irish bar! Lovely food, nice staff and loads of TVs to watch the game. Karaoke was a lot of fun too. Looking forward to my next visit. James B We loved this place. What a fun and cozy sports bar. Tons of tvâ€™s. A fun crowd. The bartender even had a strong Irish accent. Cold beers. Monday Night Football here was fun. Join us and discover the unique party experience that sets us apart â€“ because only at McSorley's is where your Fort Lauderdale story should begin. McSorley's Est. 2003 Come Visit McSorley's. Your Ultimate Party Location Only at McSorley's can you immerse yourself in the timeless charm of a historic pub while savoring the perfect beverage. With a unique blend of tradition and contemporary vibes, we create an unforgettable experience for each patron. From the moment you step through our doors, you'll sense the distinct ambiance that sets us apart. We take pride in crafting moments that linger in your memory, ensuring that every visit provides an exceptional and unparalleled social experience. Contact Us At McSorley's, we're committed to delivering exceptional service, blending top-notch hospitality with a vibrant atmosphere to create unforgettable experiences for every guest. The Moore Family Proud Owners of McSorleyâ€™s An Irish Welcome for all our guests since 2003 McSorley's Irish American owned bar has undergone a transformative journey, not just in ownership but in enhancing our service offerings. Committed to preserving our Irish roots, we've infused McSorley's with welcoming Irish values, ensuring every visit is not just a stop but a warm and memorable experience. Meet John Farino of McSorley's Beach Pub & Rooftop Lounge in Fort Lauderdale - Voyage MIA Magazine | Miami City Guide Connect To Top Home VoyageMIA FAQs About VoyageMIA Submit a story idea Privacy & Terms of Service Trending Miamiâ€™s Most Inspiring Stories Hidden Gems: Local Businesses & Creatives You Should Know Portraits of Miami Local Highlighter Series Highlighting Local Gems Whatâ€™s a moment that really shaped how you see the world? Who were you before the world told you who you had to be? What is something outside of work that is bringing you joy lately? Whatâ€™s a belief or project youâ€™re committed to, no matter how long it takes? When did you stop hiding your pain and start using it as power? Miamiâ€™s Most Inspiring Stories The True Renegades Seasons of Love The Non-Snobby Miami Dining Guide 17 Positively Brilliant Mini Recipe Videos October 5, 2017 Meet John Farino of McSorleyâ€™s Beach Pub & Rooftop Lounge in Fort Lauderdale Local Stories Share Tweet Pin Today weâ€™d like to introduce you to John Farino. John, please share your story with us. How did you get to where you are today? I started as a barback for a big nightclub in NYC called 230-Fifth to help pay my way through school and I fell in love with the hospitality/events industry. I was 20 years old and the General Manager/Director of Events really liked my work ethifc and took me under his wing. He taught me everything he could. I was bartending and planning events before I knew it. I fell away from events for a couple of years because I was making so much money bartending and having so much fun doing it that I lost track of why I stayed in this industry in the first place. I found my calling again and moved to South Florida where took over as General Manager at McSorleyâ€™s. We have a beautiful rooftop venue that can accommodate many types of events so I have put my main focus on getting those events going at this location. I have been very successful in doing so, thus far. Still, always more that needs to be done. Overall, has it been relatively smooth? If not, what were some of the struggles along the way? My mentor actually went to start his own place and brought me with him. I was the Event Coordinator there and was doing a stellar job. I was being given a lot of credit for the beautiful venue we opened and for the events that we were hosting. Although I always refuted full credit and gave him all of his due praise, he did not like all of the attention I was attracting and slowly pushed me away. It was extremely unfortunate and heart breaking for me. I not only let like I lost a friend and my mentor, more importantly, I felt that I had lost this business. I felt I couldnâ€™t do it without him. He was always there to answer my questions. Always there to yell at me or laugh at me when I made that stupid mistake. I never even had a thought of running an establishment without him by my side. I am here now though. Growing still. He still deserves a lot of credit. Please tell us about McSorleyâ€™s Beach Pub & Rooftop Lounge. McSorleyâ€™s is a versatile venue overlooking Ft. Lauderdale Beach. We cater to all types of events here and show all of the major sporting events as well. Our downstairs pub is a great place for beach goers and tourists to drag the sand in and take a break from the sun while enjoying an ice cold beverage. Our upstairs Lounge & Rooftop is a bit fancier with state of the art audio and visual equipment that really creates a powerful mood thorough the space. We do weddings, sporting events, birthday parties, bar mitzvahs, reunions, cocktail receptions, slide show presentations, etc. We can really do it all. I am the General Manager there so I really am in charge of it all. My main focus the past year in a half has been booking the parties and hosting events and living the rooftop up to its full potential. Itâ€™s been absolute success so far but there is always more work to be done. If you had to go back in time and start over, would you have done anything differently? Nothing. Itâ€™s strange. Iâ€™ve made more mistakes then the average boy growing up. If I can go back and make some changes, I could surely save myself some grief at the very least. If I did that though, would I be here where I am today? Would I have my beautiful 3-week-old son to stare at when I get home in the middle of the night? Would I be with his mother, my fiancÃ©, who is the most loyal person I have ever known in my entire life? Maybe. Maybe not. Life is about those mistakes. Those lessons that you learn get you where youâ€™re going. Itâ€™s been a tough 30 years. It really has. But I wouldnâ€™t change it for the world. Contact Info: Address: 837 North Ft. Lauderdale Beach Blvd., Ft. Lauderdale, FL 33304 Website: Mcsorleysftl.com Phone: 954-565-4446 Email: info@mcsorleysftl.com or John@mcsorleysftl.com Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/mcsorleysftl/ Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/McSorleysFTL/ Twitter: https://twitter.com/McSorleysFTL Yelp: https://www.yelp.com/biz/mcsorleys-beach-pub-fort-lauderdale Getting in touch : VoyageMIA is built on recommendations from the community; itâ€™s how we uncover hidden gems, so if you know someone who deserves recognition please let us know here .
